products.name: Poäng Armchair
products.description: A comfortable armchair with a unique design, perfect for relaxation.

features: Durable frame made of high-quality materials.
Comfortable cushioning for extended seating.
Ergonomic design for optimal support.
Available in multiple upholstery options.
Assembly required; tools and instructions included.
details.careInstructions: Regularly vacuum or brush to remove dust. Clean with a damp cloth if necessary.

products.name: MALM Bed Frame
products.description: A sturdy bed frame with a minimalist design, available in various sizes.

features: Sturdy construction with solid wood.
Available in different sizes and colors.
Minimalist design for modern interiors.
Adjustable bed sides for growing with the child.
Easy to assemble; tools and instructions included.
details.careInstructions: Wipe clean with a damp cloth. Use mild soap if necessary. Dry with a clean cloth.

products.name: TÄRENDÖ Bench
products.description: A simple and practical bench suitable for both indoor and outdoor use.

features: Made from solid pine, a natural and renewable material.
Suitable for indoor and outdoor use.
Easy to assemble; tools and instructions included.
details.careInstructions: Wipe clean with a mild soapy solution. Wipe dry with a clean cloth.

products.name: HEMNES Bed Frame
products.description: A classic bed frame with storage options and a timeless design.

features: Solid wood construction for durability and a natural feel.
Ample storage space under the bed.
Classic design that blends with various interior styles.
Easy to assemble; tools and instructions included.
details.careInstructions: Wipe clean with a damp cloth. Wipe dry with a clean cloth.

products.name: FLISAT Children's Bench
products.description: A small, sturdy bench designed specifically for children's use.

features: Solid pine wood, a durable and renewable material.
Designed for children's comfort and safety.
Easy to assemble; tools and instructions included.
details.careInstructions: Wipe clean with a mild soapy solution. Wipe dry with a clean cloth.

products.name: BRIMNES Bed Frame with Storage
products.description: A practical bed frame with ample storage space underneath, ideal for smaller bedrooms.

features: Integrated storage space under the bed.
Adjustable bed sides allow the use of mattresses of different thicknesses.
Easy to assemble; tools and instructions included.

products.name: FRIHETEN Sofa Bed
products.description: A versatile sofa bed with storage space and a comfortable design, perfect for smaller living spaces.

features: Storage space under the chaise lounge.
The lid stays open so you can safely and easily take things in and out.
You can place the chaise lounge section to the left or right of the sofa, and switch whenever you like.
Easy to assemble; tools and instructions included.
details.careInstructions: Wipe clean with a damp cloth. Wipe dry with a clean cloth.

features: Solid pine wood, a durable and renewable material.
